Project.shortdesc: The University of Newcastle has already established a Shibboleth origin as part of the Core-middleware IAMSECT project, and this work will be built upon in order to widen the use of Shibboleth within the institution. The University Library has developed a large portfolio of electronic resources with all the complexities of authentication and authorisation that this involves.
Project.name: SAPIR: Shibboleth-enabled Access to Portals and Institutional Resources
